sense.def:
A result
je nekaj, kar se zgodi ali obstaja, ker se je zgodilo nekaj drugega.

seg.quote: I nearly missed the flight as a result of going to Havana.
Twice he followed his own advice, with disastrous results.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
results in a particular situation or event
, povzroči, da se pojavijo neke okoliščine ali da se nekaj zgodi.

seg.quote: The use of such techniques could result in disastrous ecological changes.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
results from a particular event or action
, nastane zaradi tistega dogodka ali dejanja.

seg.quote: Four-fifths of the damage resulted from bombing.

sense.def:
A result
je tudi razvrstitev tekmovalcev ob koncu tekmovanja.

A result
je tudi število, ki ga dobimo pri računanju.

seg.quote: The result should be calculated to three decimal places.

sense.def:
One's results
so ocene, ki jih dobimo pri preverjanju znanja.
